title: Pompeo gets subpoena in impeachment inquiry
text: Three Democrats who chair key House committees on Friday wrote a letter to Secretary of State Mike Pompeo telling him that he is being issued a subpoena to compel him to produce documents by Oct. 4 related to the House's impeachment inquiry into President Donald Trump. The chairmen said in their letter that they first requested the documents from Pompeo on Sept. 9. "The committees are investigating the extent to which President Trump jeopardized national security by pressing Ukraine to interfere with our 2020 election and by withholding security assistance provided by Congress to help Ukraine counter Russian aggression," said Democrats Reps. Eliot L. Engel, Adam Schiff and Elijah Cummings in their letter.
